div.head: Bulgarian Specifications
div.docAuthor: Radoslav Pavlov, L.Dimitrova, Ludmila Sinapova, Kiril Simov

row.cell: mi, ti, mu, j, ni, vi, im

div.head: Notes
div.p: Adverbs of type adjectival have the same form as adjectives in Gender = neuter, Person = 3, Number = singular.

row.cell: i, a, ami, tche, tyj tche

div.head: Notes
div.p: In Bulgarian superlative particles "po" and "naj" precede the superlative Forms of adjectives and adverbs: "po-hubav", "naj-hubav", "po-bavno", "naj-bavno".

row.cell: diavol da go vzeme, ama rabota, bozhe moj

div.head: Bulgarian Attribute Index
div.p: In this section all the attributes presented in the tables are listed in alphabetical order.

div.head: Bulgarian Value Index
Bulgarian MSD Index
div.p: This index gives the list of morphosyntactic descriptions (MSDs) and their features. In the table below, the first column gives the MSD, the second its expansion into a feature-structure, the third gives the number of entries in the lexicon (54,823 entries), and the fourth gives some examples as word-form/lemma. The list was extracted form the Bulgarian MULTEXT-East lexicon.
